experiences.description: Currently working as a Full Stack Developer specializing in modern web technologies and AI integration. Responsible for developing scalable web applications, implementing AI solutions, and working with cutting-edge frameworks to deliver high-quality software solutions.
responsibilities: Developing full-stack web applications using Next.js and React.js
Building and customizing Frappe applications for business needs
Implementing AI and Generative AI solutions for automation
Creating responsive and user-friendly frontend interfaces
Database design and backend API development
Code review and mentoring junior developers
Collaborating with cross-functional teams for project delivery
achievements: Implemented AI chatbot reducing customer service time by 40%
Led frontend architecture design for major client projects
Optimized application performance resulting in 60% faster load times

experiences.description: Worked on batch manufacturing systems and in-house project development. Specialized in building enterprise solutions using C# .NET framework and Frappe framework for business process automation and manufacturing workflow management.
responsibilities: Built in-house projects using C# .NET framework
Customized Frappe applications for manufacturing processes
Implemented inventory management and tracking systems
Created automated reporting and analytics dashboards
Integration with third-party manufacturing equipment APIs
achievements: Reduced manufacturing process time by 30% through automation
Developed comprehensive batch tracking system used company-wide
Successfully migrated legacy systems to modern Frappe platform
Created automated reporting system saving 20+ hours weekly
